data.name: An Odd Tale Original Soundtrack (Deluxe Edition)
data.detailed_description:
The deluxe edition of An Odd Tale's original soundtrack, composed by 16-year-old Morgan Chow, includes all 14 original songs found in the RPG, plus five additional tracks, exclusive to Steam. These include never-before-heard original songs that were not implemented into the final version of the game and original sound effects—which can be used in your game, free of attribution.*



*If you plan on doing this, please visit the legal page of our website for a more extensive explanation.

data.short_description: The deluxe edition of An Odd Tale's original soundtrack. This OST includes the 14 original songs found in the game, plus one extended track, two never-before-heard original songs that didn't make it to the final game, and two original sound effects (that you can use in YOUR game).
data.legal_notice: An Odd Tale Original Soundtrack Copyright 2021 Morgan Chow. All rights reserved.
